teacher_info.intro:
(ES) Hola! Mi nombre es Karla, tengo 26 y vivo en la ciudad de Concepción en Chile. Desde hace varios años que estoy interesada en aprender idiomas como el inglés, alemán y francés , además de querer enseñar mi lengua nativa. Siempre he sido autodidacta por lo que mis conocimientos de inglés solo han sido estudiando por mi cuenta. Además, me gusta conocer gente nueva y a su vez enseñar e intercambiar culturas. 

(EN) Hi! My name is Karla, I am 26 and I live in the city of Concepción in Chile. For several years I have been interested in learning languages ​​like  English, German and French, as well as wanting to teach my native language. I have always been self-taught !
teacher_info.about_me:
(ES) Hola! Mi nombre es Karla, tengo 26 y vivo en la ciudad de Concepción en Chile. (EN) Hi! My name is Karla, I am 26 and I live in the city of Concepción in Chile. For several years I have been interested in learning languages ​​like  English, German and French, as well as wanting to teach my native language. I have always been self-taught !
teacher_info.about_teacher:
(ES)  No tengo título profesional para enseñar pero si una muy buena disposición y estoy convencida de que se puede aprender de manera entretenida y no monotona, lo comprobé al aprender Inglés por mi cuenta escuchando música, viendo películas en inglés y conociendo personas de diferentes partes del mundo que no hablaban español.

(EN) I don't have a professional degree to teach but I have a very good disposition and I am convinced that it can be learned in an entertaining and non-monotonous way, I verified it by learning English on my own by listening to music, watching movies in English and meeting people from different countries.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
(ES) Mis métodos de enseñanza se basa más en una conversacion con presentaciones y videos para que así sea más sencillo aprender ya que muchas veces el estudiar un idioma puede ser díficil si no se obtiene la atención del estudiante.

(EN) My teaching methods are based more on a conversation with presentations and videos so that it is easier to learn since many times studying a language can be difficult if the student's attention is not obtained.

pro_course_detail.title: Vamos a practicar !

Hola! 
si has llegado hasta mi perfil de profesora Italki, espero poder ayudarte mediante una conversación para prácticar tu español. If you want we can mix both languages like Spanish/English ! . Don't be afraid!

pro_course_detail.title: Vamos a aprender!
pro_course_detail.description:
Hola!
En este tipo de clase, vamos a aprender desde lo básico del español hasta mantener una conversación fluida, con palabras nuevas y practicaremos escritura también. Te espero!

teacher_info.intro:
Soy Nicolás. Soy estudiante de derecho y estudiante de inglés desde hace 17 años. Y actualmente estudiante de alemán. 
Siempre me gustó aprender idiomas, porque es importante para conocer nuevas culturas pero además para poder comunicarse con personas de diferentes países.  Es por eso que también me pareció una excelente oportunidad poder ser tutor y comenzar a enseñar de una manera dinámica un hermoso idioma como lo es el español.
Actualmente me encuentro realizando la formación oficial como profesor de Español, de la Universidad de Salamanca (España).
teacher_info.short_signature: Tutor de Español nativo y con más de 2 años de experiencia
teacher_info.about_me:
Soy Nicolás. Soy estudiante de derecho y estudiante de inglés desde hace 17 años. Y actualmente estudiante de alemán. 
Siempre me gustó aprender idiomas, porque es importante para conocer nuevas culturas pero además para poder comunicarse con personas de diferentes países.  Es por eso que también me pareció una excelente oportunidad poder ser tutor y comenzar a enseñar de una manera dinámica un hermoso idioma como lo es el español.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Como profesor creo que la comunicación es la parte fundamental para el desarrollo del aprendizaje de un idioma. También considero que dependiendo de las necesidades y metas de cada alumno, el uso de material puede ser diverso. 
Me gusta que en mis clases, los alumnos puedan sentirse fuera de la presión de una clase tradicional y que se sientan en un ambiente más distendido.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Mis clases harán foco principalmente en la conversación ya que esta es un pilar fundamental para aprender un idioma. Pero dependiendo en las necesidades de cada alumno podemos trabajar con diferentes materiales y métodos

pro_course_detail.title: Hablemos en Español!
pro_course_detail.description:
Bienvenidos! En esta clase focalizaremos mucho en la conversación . La expresión oral es una gran herramienta para adquirir vocabulario y estructuras gramaticales que de otra forma puede ser un poco tedioso.  Para conversar, trabajaremos con noticias, audios, videos y canciones sobre los temas de interés de cada alumno. 
Welcome! In this class, we'll focus mainly in conversation. Oral expression is a great tool to learn new vocabulary and grammar structeres that can be tedious to learn in another ways. For our talks, we'll work with news, audios, videos and songs about the topics that each student founds interesting.

pro_course_detail.title: Español para viajeros!
pro_course_detail.description:
¿Así que te gusta viajar? ¿Vas a viajar a un país hispano-hablante? ¿Querés aprender vocabulario específico sobre viajes? ¿Querés aprender español para viajar? Entonces esta es tu clase. 
En esta clase trabajaremos con vocabulario, haciendo énfasis en la conversación, para que sepas todo lo necesario para afrontar tus vacaciones.  
Los espero para una primer clase!

So you like travelling? Are you going to travel to a Spanish-speaking country? Do you want to learn specific vocabulary about travelling, holidays, etc? Do you want to learn Spanish to travel? So this is the perfect class for you!!!
In this class we will work with specific vocabulary, emphasizing conversation, so that you can know everything you need to face your vacation.
Looking foward for your first class!

pro_course_detail.title: Español para todos los niveles
pro_course_detail.description:
Bienvenidos!!! En esta clase, dependiendo del nivel de cada alumno, trabajaremos con diferentes textos, ejercicios, prácticas de conversación y más. Es muy importante fomentar la expresión oral independientemente del nivel de cada alumno, pero también es muy importante dependiendo en las necesidades de cada uno, utilizar libros, audios, noticias, canciones y otras herramientas.
El Español es un idioma muy rico, y aprenderlo es un gran desafío! No es fácil, pero con un  poco de práctica, esfuerzo y sacrifico, nada es imposible! 
Te espero para comenzar este gran viaje que es aprender el español!!!!

teacher_info.intro: Hola! Mi nombre es Daniela, soy de Lima – Perú y el español es mi idioma nativo. Actualmente estoy estudiando Comunicaciones Audiovisuales y siempre me apasiona conocer sobre nuevas culturas a través de su arte, historia y lenguaje. Tengo una mente abierta y siempre estoy dispuesta a aprender sobre nuevos temas. Al terminar la secundaria, realice el Programa de Diploma del Bachillerato International (International Baccalaurete) en inglés y alemán, así que comprendo lo complicado que puede ser aprender un nuevo idioma.

teacher_info.about_teacher: Como profesora, seré muy amigable y paciente. Mis clases estarán dirigidas específicamente a las necesidades y requisitos de cada estudiante.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Creo que la mejor manera de aprender es estando interesado en los temas . Así que podremos tener conversaciones “reales” y  espontáneas basadas en tus intereses o sobre temas actuales. Siempre incluyendo material externo, como ppts y ejercicios de escritura/lectura. Mi objetivo será siempre ayudarte a mejorar tus habilidades en español de la manera más divertida.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish Conversation - Informal tutoring
pro_course_detail.description:
This kind of lesson is for students that want to practice their speaking skills.  
In these lessons, we will practice Spanish in a fun way, talking about different topics that interest you like series, movies, culture, etc.  By speaking informally, you will learn new expressions, grammar points, and vocabulary.
But don't worry about it, I will speak clearly and correct you whenever you make a mistake.  And if it's needed I can also switch to English to explain something and solve your doubts.  See you soon!

teacher_info.intro:

Hello, my name’s Aldo. I’m a professional classical musician. I play viola and violin, and am a music teacher, arranger and composer. I’m currently learning Polish, and I like to read novels, cook Japanese food, and bake bread, cakes and cookies.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Cuento con 6 años de experiencia como maestro y me especializo en la enseñanza de uno a uno. Disfruto mucho ayudando a mis alumnos a aprender lo que les interesa y a cumplir sus metas. Además de enseñar violín y viola, he tutor en español e inglés conversacional y en la preparación de ensayos y escritos. 

I have 6 years of teaching experience and I specialize in teaching one on one. I really enjoy helping my students learn whatever they are interested in and to help them accomplish their goals. Besides teaching violin and viola, I have tutored Spanish and English, both in conversational settings as well as in writing essays and other assignments.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Me gusta adaptarme a las ambiciones y estilo de aprendizaje de cada estudiante. Ya sea un ambiente casual de estilo conversacional, escuchar historias, trabajar en escritura y redacción, gramática, vocabulario, o alguna combinación de todo lo anterior. Incluso podría acompañarte a aprender juntos un tema específico de tu interés. ¡Sería un gusto ayudarte!

I like to adapt to the goals and learning styles of each student. This can include casual conversations, listening to stories, working on writing skills, grammar and vocabulary, or some combination of all of the above. We could even learn a specific topic of your interest together. Looking forward to helping you on your learning journey!

pro_course_detail.title: Español conversacional / Conversational Spanish
pro_course_detail.description:
Aprende español a tu propio ritmo con un programa de estilo conversacional hecho a tu medida. Apto para todos los niveles y edades. Háblemos sobre temas de tu interés en un ambiente casual y familiar. O quizá prefiera usar un tono formal y prepararse para situaciones de carácter oficial. ¡Agenda una lección y con gusto trabajamos para cumplir tus metas!

Learn Spanish at your own pace with a conversational program tailored just for you. All levels and ages are welcome. Let's talk about topics of your interest in a casual and familiar environment. Or perhaps you would like to familiarize yourself with the Spanish Formal You and which situations to use it in. I'm looking forward to working together and meet your learning goals!

pro_course_detail.title: Escritura y redacción / Spanish writing practice
pro_course_detail.description:
¿Quieres perfeccionar tus habilidades de escritura y redacción en español? ¿Te interesaría estudiar grámatica, ortografía o el uso de la tilde? En este clase podemos trabajar y perfeccionar cualquiera de estos aspectos para enriquecer tu aprendizaje. Apto para todos los niveles y edades. Aprende a tu propio ritmo con un programa hecho a la medida de tus necesidades y metas.

Would you like to work on your Spanish writing skills? Are you interested in deepening your knowledge of Spanish grammar, spelling and diacritical marks? We can work together on any of these topics together. All levels and ages are welcome. Learn at your own pace in a program made to fit your own needs and goals.

pro_course_detail.title: Comprensión lectora, audición y pronunciación / Reading comprehension, listening and pronunciation

Would you like to work on your reading skills? Are you interested in developing your listening comprehension? Perhaps you would like to perfect your pronunciation? We can work together to improve any of these language aspects and tackle topics of your interest. All levels and ages are welcome.

teacher_info.intro: I am a law student in the penultimate semester and a language enthusiast. I have certifications in English (TOEFL), French (DALF C1) and I am currently studying to obtain my certification in Portuguese. I love World History and studying about the cultures of each continent, I believe the world is too big, varied and beautiful to keep seeing the same place or the same people all the time.
teacher_info.short_signature: Language enthusiast, teacher and law student.
teacher_info.about_me: I am a law student in the penultimate semester and a language enthusiast. I have certifications in English (TOEFL), French (DALF C1) and I am currently studying to obtain my certification in Portuguese. I love World History and studying about the cultures of each continent, I believe the world is too big, varied and beautiful to keep seeing the same place or the same people all the time.
teacher_info.about_teacher: The word that defines me is "dedication"; patience and time are my great weapons. I like to be committed and disciplined in what I do, because I like the others to have a positive opinion about me and my work. I do not rest until the student has achieved his/her goals.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My method consists of practical exercises. The fact that the student learns to use short sentences from day 1 gives great dynamism to the class and fosters interest. I don't like to saturate the student with grammar exercises, rather, encourage him to speak and write as much as he can, immersing him in the use of the language. That is the natural way of learning, through which small children or foreigners learn.

pro_course_detail.title: Basic/intermediate Spanish class (oral and written production/comprehension).
pro_course_detail.description: In this class you will start using common phrases while enriching your grammar and your vocabulary. The main goal of the class is learning how to interact with natives and survive in everyday situations. You may also learn a little bit more about the mexican culture.

pro_course_detail.title: Hot topics in Spanish grammar.
pro_course_detail.description: In this class we will review some of the important topics in the Spanish grammar and how to build complex sentences. We may also practice specialized Spanish, according to your needs.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational practice in Spanish.
pro_course_detail.description: In this class we will talk! We may choose between a wide variety of topics such as history, culture, sports, politics, news, economy, etc. to have a conversation in which I will be guiding you and correcting your mistakes. You don´t have to be advanced, but you must have at least some conversational skills.

teacher_info.intro: Soy una persona alegre, me gusta la música, bailar como buen colombiano, leer, montar bicicleta y compartir con mi familia y amigos, me encanta conversar,  hablar de todo, desde politica o deportes hasta viajes e historias de vida.
teacher_info.short_signature: Profesor de español "ELE" Cinco años de experiencia. clases tranquilas y divertidas.
teacher_info.about_me: Soy una persona alegre, me gusta la música, bailar como buen colombiano, leer, montar bicicleta y compartir con mi familia y amigos, me encanta conversar,  hablar de todo, desde politica o deportes hasta viajes e historias de vida.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Soy muy responsable y dedicado con lo que hago, Tengo cinco años de experiencia como profesor de español para extranjeros, amo mi trabajo porque conozco el mundo a través de las historias de mis estudiantes, no hago exámenes pero me gusta el trabajo en casa si el estudiante lo desea. Soy muy organizado y llevo el registro de los temas vistos así como el progreso del estudiante. Tengo buena pronunciación ya que soy de Medellín Colombia reconocida por tener un acentro neutro y pausado.

Manejo la gramática cognitiva, es decir, entender el el sentido real de un tema gramátical mas allá de la reglas.

exp_info.description: Trabajé por más de tres años allí pero debido a la pandemia la Escuela Colombia Immersion cerró sus puertas.

edu_info.description: En este momento curso el nivel 8 de mi carrera en "Español y literatura" en la universidad de Antioquia.

pro_course_detail.title: Past tense masterclass
pro_course_detail.description:
In this focussed session you will finally master the past tense. Learn the grammar while practising every day conversations, like talking about your weekend, the last vacation you went on, or share your favourite childhood stories. 

We´ll cover the differences between the different past tenses in Spanish, when to use them, irregular verbs and lots of tips to improve your fluency. All classes are tailored to your level and interests. My classes are chilled and fun, with a strong emphasis on conversation. 

En este curso por fin podrás contar las historias  que desees. 
Diferencia entre los pasados, cuando usarlos, verbos irregulares y todos los tips  para mejorar tu fluidez. Metodología tranquila y divertida, enfocada en la conversación.

pro_course_detail.title: The Basics. Everything you need to spèak Spanish on your next vacation!
pro_course_detail.description:
In this course we´ll perfect the basics, including: present tense, greetings and everyday phrases, pronouns, the difference between ser y estar (the two ways of saying ´to be´ in Spanish), articles, and numbers. 

You´ll pick up lots of new vocabulary as you go, including all the essentials for you next Spanish speaking vacation. All classes are tailored to your level and interests. My classes are chilled and fun, with a strong emphasis on conversation. 


En este curso perfecciona el presente simple, saludos y presentaciones,  objetos directos e indirectos, aprende la diferencia de ser-estar, Los numeros, cómo comprar en una tienda, articulos definidos, indefinidos y neutros, en general vocabulario de sustantivos y verbos. 
Clases tranquilas y divertidas enfocadas en la conversación.

pro_course_detail.title: Intermediate Spanish course: gain confidence with your Spanish!
pro_course_detail.description:
In this course you´ll solidify everything you have learned so far, with lots of conversation practice. We´ll also cover: how to use the main forms of Spanish past tense, conditional tense, how to talk about the future, and relative pronouns. 

You´ll continue learning lots of new vocabulary as we chat about a wide range of themes, from Netflix to music to football to Colombia! All classes are tailored to your level and interests. My classes are chilled and fun, with a strong emphasis on conversation. 

En este curso aprenderás las diferencias de los tres pasados, perfecto, indefinido e imperfecto, también aprenderás condicional simple, pronombres relativos (El que, la que, lo que) futuro simple, Vocabulario de verbos y sustantivos en general. Consolidamos temás que ya sabes. Las clases son tranquilas y divertidas enfocadas en la conversación.

pro_course_detail.title: Advanced Spanish course: let´s take your Spanish one step closer to fluency!
pro_course_detail.description:
In this course you´ll learn to master the mysterious Spanish subjunctive! If you already know the grammatical rules, we´ll perfect your usage and have you talking like a native. If not, no fear as we´ll start from the basics.

Depending on your level and need, we will also cover: advanced uses of ser y estar, pronominal verbs and meaning-changing verbs, Spanish phrasal verbs. We´ll identify and correct any small errors you might still be making and revisit anything you´re unusure of from your Spanish learning so far. 

All classes are tailored to your level and interests. My classes are chilled and fun, with a strong emphasis on conversation. 

En este curso perfeccionarás o aprenderás desde cero, los cuatro subjuntivos, perfeccionamiento de ser y estar para avanzados, verbos pronominales y verbos de cambio, perifrasis verbales. Identificamos y corregimos los errores de temas que ya has visto. Las clases son tranquilas y divertidas enfocadas en la conversación.

pro_course_detail.title: Whatever you want: tailored classes to focus on the areas most important to you!
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you want to learn Spanish football vocabulary? Or slang terms from Casa de Papel? Or do you want to spend an hour looking at something you´ve always struggled with in Spanish class? Or have a Spanish literature discussion with me? In this class we´ll cover whatever theme you like: you decide!

All classes are tailored to your level and interests. My classes are chilled and fun, with a strong emphasis on conversation. 

En este curso podrás revisar o aprender desde los temas básicos hasta los más avanzados de acuerdo a tu necesidad y según tus intereses. Puedes practicar las cuatro habilidades con actividades según tu nivel. (Leer, hablar, escribir y escuchar). Las clases son tranquilas y divertidas enfocadas en la conversación.

teacher_info.about_me: Mi nombre es Rodrigo, tengo 23 años y soy de Argentina. Estoy estudiando la carrera de Profesorado en Historia, y en mi tiempo libre me gusta entrenar, jugar al fútbol y pasar tiempo con mis amigos.

pro_course_detail.title: Lectura y pronunciación en español
pro_course_detail.description: Con la ayuda de un texto de tu selección o la mía, leerás y juntos identificaremos si hay fallas en la fonética. Podrás incrementar tus habilidades de reading y pronunciation con esta clase.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello, my name is Maryangel! I'm from Venezuela a beautiful and tropical country in Latin America. And here I will give you 5 reasons why you will love studying Spanish with me:

#1: I will teach you with a lot of love and patience.
#2:You learn from mistakes. Our 100% Spanish classes will help you improve your self-confidence in the language.
#3: From the first class we will establish what your objectives are and how we are going to achieve them.
#4:I will send you all the personalized material you need.
#5:Count on me to clarify your doubts.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello!  My name is Ignacio and I am keen to help you improve your spoken Spanish and/or French.

After a career spanning over 25 years in a global setting as an officer of the United Nations managing international aid, I have retired early and now I have plenty of time to tutor students further their conversational skills and broaden their vocabulary.  

I studied in the US, France and Japan and worked overseas in Asia, Africa, Europe and the Americas. I realize that my background is very useful in connecting / communicating with my students. I am equally fluent in English, while I remain a learner in many other languages, wherever I have lived!

teacher_info.about_teacher: I have been tutoring conversational Spanish and French for the past 10 years, first as a hobby with friends and acquaintances, then as a part-time activity to help students deepen their knowledge of the language beyond grammar and textbooks. Presently, I tutor in conversational Spanish and French online (I also tutor English and French locally at my village). I make my classes fun to ensure you are enjoying yourself as I find that students retain more information and learn more this way.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My conversational classes are intended to help students improve their oral skills, both practical conversation as well as pronunciation.
My methodology is simple and effective:
 1- Understand the student's needs and define learning goals.
 2- Propose a teaching approach based on students' preferences and combining various resources (for ex. Q&A, audio, video, simulations, text, etc).
 3- Maintain a structure with purpose, we don't talk randomly.

pro_course_detail.title: ¡Vamos a hablar! Let's speak! Conversation practice in SPANISH: vocabulary, pronunciation

This class is designed to help you improve your conversational skills, vocabulary and pronunciation while learning about Spanish culture, traditions, history, food, sports or any topic that are you would like to discuss. 
This is a hands-on lesson. I will be asking you questions on the topics of your interest to make sure you speak so I can help you improve your grammar, learn new words, accent, etc.
Based on your objectives, we will also rehearse specific situations that you would like to practice, for example: job interview, booking appointments, street conversation, business language, etc.
We will go at your own pace to make sure you understand and that you are making good progress.

pro_course_detail.description:

We will go at your own pace to make sure you understand and that you are making good progress.

Por tanto, promuevo que la conversación fluya a partir de ideas/temáticas que propongo y preparo previamente, para que el estudiante sea el que de forma natural desarrolle, estructure, exprese y exponga sus ideas mientras habla sobre el tema que se aborda.

teacher_info.introduction: CLASE MODELO ---->Descripción de imágenes, lectura,etc. CLICK ON HERE> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-hTnftJwoD4&feature=youtu.be Me, learning Chinese --> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CgDrxL4aFF0&feature=youtu.be Hi, I'm Oscar and I'm from Peru. I'm here on italki to help you to improve your Spanish skills. I know how challenging it can be to learn a language. I myself am studying Japanese, and German.The language learning journey never ends as there is always something new to learn. The most important thing, however, is that you have fun along the way. By doing so you will have an improved memory. For example, when we learn new words, we can link them to certain sounds in our native language and create a ridiculous and entertaining story. The crazier the story, the more likely it will stick in our memory. I learned that from "Fluent in 3 months" by Benny Lewis. Our lessons will adapt to your specific needs: conversation, pronunciation, vocabulary, and grammar. //HOLA SOY OSCAR, de Perú, país en el que se habla un español neutral. teacher_info.about_teacher:
As a teacher, I'm fully dedicated toward my work. The time of my student is valuable and I want to make the best of their time.
I'm striving to help my students to get better by staying up-to-date with current technology and events, taking in consideration every profile to adapt the best teaching style to each individual. Beyond the course, I build good relationships with them as their journey is my journey, their success is my success.
I´d like to receive a  brief  description before booking a lesson , in that way I´ll be able to prepare the right lesson for you. 
➡Some contacts methods I use are Zoom, Skype, Google Meets, Facetime, etc.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
→→Feel free to watch my MODEL LESSONS  on Youtube:  www.youtube.com/channel/UCqeR8sa9
The teaching is based on 3 ingredients (V.I.E)
-Visual presentations
-Interactive lessons
-Engaging topics

The course will simulate a real-life conversation, as you were traveling or living in a Spanish-speaking country. 
The complexity of the grammar will be visual-based explained and straightforward. 
Homeworks will be assigned to you as you will be the cook of your own progress. 
Relevant feedback will be provided, you will be aware of your recurring mistakes and suggestions will also be provided. 
Even if your vocabulary is limited, the course will be adjusted to your level, with a dash of "difficulty"
teacher_info.cancel_policy: If you do not attend  I would kindly  ask you to pay for the lesson as  I couldn´t teach anyone else during that time. Please do not insist  on rescheduling. Also, do not book many lessons ahead-even  4 months in advance-. and then start cancelling all , as I´m not going to accept the cancellation. I took the time to plan ahead and to click  in every lesson for accepting them. Please, make sure you´ll show up before booking a lesson.  Best wishes!!  Lest´s embark  in this new adventure!!

     effectively. Start with identifying cognates (Spanish words that are similar to their English 
     equivalents), hearing the five Spanish vowel sounds, and practicing basic greetings, 
     responses, and goodbyes.

✔IELTS 
Primary objective
👉To introduce students to the format and structure of the speaking portion of the IELTS examination. 
👉To examine the type of recordings that appear in part I to IV of the exam. 
👉To introduce short-answer questions.
👉To introduce sentence completion sentence.
👉To practice searching for key words and phrases and relevant information in the reading texts.
👉To understand the format of the IELTS Writing exam, including the differences between Academic and General Training and the two parts of the exam.
👉The  assessment test criteria are also introduced.
